changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) From concept_reference_term where `code` in ("165656","162604","165645","165833","165850","159942","165844") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "CEIL" and retired =0 );

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Yes","No","Unknown") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "TH, History of recent travel in past 14 days");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to History of recent travel in past 14 days

changeSet.author: SreeKalyan
